thought: The Gmail action (action_3) is not configured with any parameters, causing the workflow to fail. It requires 'sendTo', 'subject', 'emailType', and 'message' parameters properly set. I will set these parameters according to the user requirements: recipient email, subject 'Commercial Entry Classification', emailType 'text', and message extracted from input_data.
plan: Set 'message' parameter to expression '={{$json["message"]}}' to extract message content from input_data
Test Gmail sending with these parameters
criticism: Currently, the Gmail action has empty params causing execution failure. Need to fix params to enable sending emails for 'to Customer' entries.

tool_input.comments: Send classified commercial entries to email with formatted subject and message content.
